summary:
Yahoo is an American internet company that offers various online services. It was founded in 1994 by Jerry Yang and David Filo and became a popular website in the 1990s. Yahoo provides a search engine, email (Yahoo Mail), news, sports, and finance information.

Over time, Yahoo's popularity decreased as it faced competition from companies like Facebook and Google. Despite this, it remains a well-known brand, now owned by Apollo Global Management and Verizon Communications.
title: Yahoo
